sub_title: Director of Sales Southern Europe, MEA-AP
summary:
As a Sales Director with a focus on Southern Europe, Middle East, Africa, and Asia-Pacific (MEA-APAC) regions, I bring over two decades of experience in the bakery industry to drive impactful results. My expertise spans various bakery establishments, from small-scale enterprises to large-scale operations, providing me with a well-rounded skill set as a versatile bakery specialist. Throughout my career, I have prioritized continuous learning, successfully completing several college and university courses to enhance my knowledge and capabilities.

Notably, I hold a Bachelor of Business Administration degree with a specialization in management, economics, and law, which serves as a strong foundation for my strategic approach. Additionally, I have obtained certifications in bakery entrepreneurship and bakery teaching, further strengthening my industry expertise.

In my role as a Sales Director for Southern Europe, MEA-APAC, I am excited to lead business development and sales initiatives, propelling growth across these regions. At the forefront of my responsibilities, I develop and execute effective marketing strategies, conduct comprehensive market forecasting and analysis, and establish and manage a robust sales network, collaborating closely with local Sales Agents. These tasks are instrumental in achieving business expansion and driving revenue growth.

Passionate about the bakery industry, I thrive on leveraging my expertise to foster enduring client relationships while consistently surpassing sales targets. I am eager to connect with fellow professionals and explore opportunities for collaboration in this dynamic role as a Sales Director for Southern Europe, MEA-APAC.
